Bukavu.title: Bukavu
Bukavu.byline: Bukavu is in the Democratic Republic of the Congo.

Bukhara.title: Bukhara
Bukhara.byline: Bukhara (also spelled Bokhara, Bukhoro, or Buxoro) in Uzbekistan was historically one of the great trading cities along the Silk Road.

Bukit Barisan Selatan National Park.title: Bukit Barisan Selatan National Park
Bukit Barisan Selatan National Park.byline: Bukit Barisan Selatan National Park is an Indonesian National Park spanning three provinces on the island of Sumatra.

Bukit Kayu Hitam.title: Bukit Kayu Hitam
Bukit Kayu Hitam.byline: Bukit Kayu Hitam is a town in Kedah, Malaysia.

Bukit Merah.title: Bukit Merah
Bukit Merah.byline: Bukit Merah Laketown Resort is an eco-tourism destination in Perak, near the towns of Semanggol and Taiping.

Bukit Mertajam.title: Bukit Mertajam
Bukit Mertajam.byline: Bukit Mertajam is a town in Penang, Malaysia.

Bukit Peninsula.title: Bukit Peninsula
Bukit Peninsula.byline: The Bukit Peninsula is southernmost point of Bali, Indonesia.

Bukittinggi.title: Bukittinggi
Bukittinggi.byline: Bukittinggi is a city of 117,000 people (2014) in West Sumatra.

Bukit Tinggi.title: Bukit Tinggi
Bukit Tinggi.byline: Bukit Tinggi is an area in Pahang, Malaysia, near Janda Baik.

Bukovina.title: Bukovina
Bukovina.byline: Bukovina is a historic region of Central Europe that is now divided between Ukraine and Romania.

Bukoba.title: Bukoba
Bukoba.byline: Bukoba is a city of 145,000 people (2022) in Northwest Tanzania.

Bukit Gambir.title: Bukit Gambir
Bukit Gambir.byline: Bukit Gambir is a town in Tangkak District, Johor, Malaysia.

Bukuru.title: Bukuru
Bukuru.byline: Bukuru is a very old city near Jos in Plateau State in North Central Nigeria.
